pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Aquo domaintables from R (Dutch) // The Aquo Standard is the Dutch Standard for the exchange of data in water management. With *aquodom* (short for aquo domaintables) it is easy to exploit the API (https://www.aquo.nl/index.php/Hoofdpagina) to download domaintables of the Aquo Standard and use them in R.
